glsa.title: isync: Man-in-the-Middle attack
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in isync could allow remote attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: isync is an IMAP and MailDir mailbox synchronizer.

description.p: isync does not properly verify the serverâ€™s hostname against the CN field in the SSL certificate.

impact.p: A remote server could perform man-in-the-middle attacks to disclose passwords or obtain other sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All isync users should upgrade to the latest version:
